root: ^Tim` I just can't imagine anyone who would do something like this.

c-0: ^Tim` It is. And everyone here is like a friend. I feel like I would be betraying them to think of them as murderers.

Choices: ^Is there anyone you get along with well?
^Is there anyone you don't get along with?
Choice1: ^Tim` Well, sure. All of the acrobats. Even Jules. I still think of them as one of the acrobats.
Choice2: ^Tim` Oh dear, I couldn't possibly- Well, I suppose some of the customers can be mean sometimes.

c-0: ^Tim` But all the employees have been so lovely.
^What about Jules? How have you gotten along with them?

NEXT: ^Tim` I've been worried about them ever since the accident yesterday.

c-0: ^Tim` They used to be so happy, but they haven't been so happy since then.
^Tim` I even offered them flowers once, but I don't think it helped.
